list.title: module:main
list.description: Main process file for the Electron TDD Project This file handles the core application lifecycle, window management, and IPC communication setup.

list.title: module:main~createWindow
list.description: Creates a new browser window for the application. This function initializes the main application window with specific dimensions and web preferences.

list.title: module:main~initializeApp
list.description:
Initializes the application and sets up event handlers. This function manages the application lifecycle including:

  • Window creation
  • Application activation handling
  • Window closure handling

list.title: module:main~webPreferences.nodeIntegration
list.description: Enable Node.js integration in the renderer process
